column4: I'm having trouble booting an ubuntu system. out of the blue, it has started to come up with "error while loading shared libraries: .... invalid ELF header". after many of those errors on boot, GDM eventaully complains that the gdm user does not exist. I can't even log in as root... it obviously is having trouble loading things
... and it doesn't know what its own hostname is!
Start kissing your system goodbye. Filesystem corruption probably
